name: RoboMentum
description:
You will parkour across the harsh and frozen landscape of the north pole, each subsequent right run will allow you for a more dynamic and epic run across the icy level. The faster you will be the more points you will unlock in a quite detailed and big skill tree, where you can buy and upgrade skills for your parkour, the game allows you to quit and replay anytime by saving the progress of your skill tree.

The game also contains not finished Boss level, it should give you the idea of the grandiosity and closed space dynamic Boss fights we envisioned for the game.
